changes.change: - Slight improvements to header/title in settings
- Fixed folder paging for iOS 10 - Fixed force home for iOS 10
- Fixed visual bug when going in applications with app close reset enabled
- Fully Fixed application moving to selected download page on updating
- Parital fix to application moving to selected download page on updating
- Added option to select default download page
- Added option to force homescreen on device lock
- Fixed folders not opening when App Close Reset is enabled
- Reverted back to older method for App Close Reset - Added another method for App Close Reset
- Moved App Close Reset out of beta
- Added Spotlight as default page option - Added App Close Reset as a beta feature
- Added iPhone 6s/6s+ support - Fixed newstand issues for iOS 9
